mapper.select: SELECT A.tablespace_name, A.owner,A.table_owner,A.table_name,B.COLUMN_NAME,A.index_name FROM ALL_INDEXES A, ALL_IND_COLUMNS B WHERE A.OWNER IN ('SFC','SFCBASE','SFCRUNTIME') AND A.index_name =B.index_name AND A.TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE '%_EX' ORDER BY A.tablespace_name,A.table_owner,A.OWNER,A.TABLE_NAME

SELECT A.tablespace_name, A.owner,A.table_owner,A.table_name,B.COLUMN_NAME,A.index_name FROM ALL_INDEXES A, ALL_IND_COLUMNS B WHERE A.OWNER IN ('SFC','SFCBASE','SFCRUNTIME') AND A.index_name =B.index_name AND A.TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE '%_EX' AND A.TABLE_NAME =#{tableName} ORDER BY A.tablespace_name,A.table_owner,A.OWNER,A.TABLE_NAME
